# Carbondale Bike Project

> The Carbondale Bike Project is a volunteer-run community bicycle shop and education program in Carbondale, Colorado. Our mission is to increase individual, community, environmental, and global health by operating a sustainable, safe, and educational community bicycle shop and related programs.

## Pages

- [Home](https://carbondalebikeproject.org/index.txt): Open shop hours, mission, community impact, and Kickstand Club donation progress
- [About](https://carbondalebikeproject.org/about.txt): Mission, what we offer, shop guidelines, history (2009â€“present), leadership, and community partners
- [Programs](https://carbondalebikeproject.org/programs.txt): Community shop time, landfill diversion, school programs, and workshops
- [How Can I Help](https://carbondalebikeproject.org/how-can-i-help.txt): Ways to donate items, share skills, give financially, and spread the word
- [Contact](https://carbondalebikeproject.org/contact.txt): Location, phone, shop hours, contact form, and donation links

## Optional

- [RSS Feed](https://carbondalebikeproject.org/feed.xml): Site updates feed
